item.description:
i everyone,

I have a recommendation about a Halloween Party. I came across this party at Cure Lounge (one of the best clubs in town) and the ticket is only $10-$15. For those that have tried to go out on Halloween, probably you know how expensive the covers can be and how long are the lines to get in. So, I thought this is a great deal because the location is perfect, the price is perfect and you buy the ticket in advance, so no waiting in the line :) Here's more details on the party and the link to buy the ticket. Hope to see you there!!! :)

http://brutalhalloween.eventbrite.com/#
Come out and help us raise hell on this night of sinful seduction and
devilish dancing!

Cure Lounge will be packed this Friday night so get there early to
avoid the line and enjoy the blood rushing beats provided by DJ Profenna.

Donâ€™t miss out on the #1 party in Boston to honor the living dead and
celebrate All Hallows' Eve!!! This night is sure to be a Thriller!

Dress to impress in your most creative and sexiest costumes.

Ticket price will increase on Monday 10/22.

Lost Souls Welcome (feel free to invite all your friends to the event,
tickets available at the door)
item.name: Halloween Party - Hellraiser's Ball
